Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.pairsegments

Visualizers for inspecting cluster differences using pair counting segments.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CircleSegmentsVisualizer
    Visualizer to draw circle segments of clusterings and enable interactive selection of segments.
    SegmentsStylingPolicy
    Styling policy to communicate the segment selection to other visualizers.
